segments.text: Have you gone to school today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went to school today . Did you go to school ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I couldn't go to school today , I was sick .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's horrible . I'd be happy to give you the assignments from English class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much , that's kind of you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you miss a day of school , I'll be happy to give you the English assignments .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is greatly appreciated and I hope you feel well enough to go to school tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
